tags.name: ef-sidebar-layout
tags.description:
Provides an app layout with sidebar.
There are 4 sections that can be slotted a component in.

attributes.name: sidebar-width
attributes.description: Set the width of the sidebar. The value could be in both px or %, e.g. 300px, 30%

attributes.name: sidebar-position
attributes.description: Set sidebar position to left or right

properties.name: sidebarWidth
properties.description: Set the width of the sidebar. The value could be in both px or %, e.g. 300px, 30%

properties.name: sidebarPosition
properties.description: Set sidebar position to left or right
